a:entry.a:title: Visa - go
a:entry.reducedDescription: Visa will give you an additional 300 points to use on Xbox for FREE! Microsoft Points can be used to buy Games on Demand, Game Add-ons, Arcade Title, HD movies and TV downloads or in the new Avatar Marketplace. Microsoft Points may be used towards Xbox content and merchandise on Xbox LIVE or Xbox.com. Xbox Live Gold or Silver membership registration required. Terms and Conditions: Free Microsoft Points Gift Offer available between 9/1/09 and 9/30/09 to Xbox Live Gold or Silver Account holders â€¦
a:entry.fullDescription: Visa will give you an additional 300 points to use on Xbox for FREE! Microsoft Points can be used to buy Games on Demand, Game Add-ons, Arcade Title, HD movies and TV downloads or in the new Avatar Marketplace. Microsoft Points may be used towards Xbox content and merchandise on Xbox LIVE or Xbox.com. Xbox Live Gold or Silver membership registration required. Terms and Conditions: Free Microsoft Points Gift Offer available between 9/1/09 and 9/30/09 to Xbox Live Gold or Silver Account holders in good standing, who buy 2000 or more Microsoft points with their Visa card. Microsoft Points are non-transferrable and are subject to the terms and conditions of the Microsoft Points program. Microsoft Promotional Points codes must be redeemed by 11:59:59 pm ET on 6/30/2010. Microsoft Promotion Points codes that are not redeemed by 11:59:59 pm ET on 6/30/2010 are void. All selections will be conducted under the supervision of Sponsor (Microsoft), whose decisions are final. No substitution, transfer, or assignment permitted, except that Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a Gift of equal or greater value. Taxes on the Gift Offer are solely the responsibility of the recipients. Sponsor is not responsible for technical errors of any kind, including software or network transmission errors. Offer valid to individual customers, limit [1] per Xbox Live account. Microsoft Points are subject to the terms and conditions set by Microsoft Corporation. See www.xbox.com/en-US/live/microsoftpoints.htm for details regarding Microsoft Points program. Microsoft Points have no cash value and cannot be substituted or exchanged for cash.
